Detailed Description

Example teleop-based input for use with modbridge_node.

Provides scaled joystick input to the modbridge_ex_controller node.

Author
Shashank Swaminathan sh.sw.nosp@m.ami2.nosp@m.35@gm.nosp@m.ail..nosp@m.com
